item.title: Discover, Assess, and Migrate to Azure with Azure Migrate
item.description: Azure Migrate is a powerful platform that simplifies the process of migrating, modernizing, and optimizing your infrastructure, data, and applications for Azure. This comprehensive service provides a unified portal to streamline your entire cloud migration journey. Unified Migration Platform Azure Migrate offers a centralized hub where you can start, run, and track your migration to Azure. It provides a range of assessment and migration tools, including Azure Migrate: Discovery and Assessment, and Migration and Modernization.

item.title: Preparing On-Premises Machines for Migration to Azure
item.description: Preparing On-Premises Machines for Migration to Azure Azure Migrate is a service that helps you discover, assess, and migrate on-premises machines to Microsoft Azure. This comprehensive guide will walk you through the steps to prepare your on-premises machines before migrating them to Azure using the Azure Migrate service. Verify Migration Limitations Before you begin, it’s important to understand the discovery, assessment, and migration limits for Azure Migrate. The table below summarizes these limits across different scenarios:
